overview:
Developer and Entrepreneur.

Peter is a coder that is starting up one company whose goal is to create software solutions for small and medium enterprises that company is cephas and he is the founder. The first products of cephas are being prepared for launch with two apps already launched for beta testing the apps both have web versions and Java ME version for low end Nokia Phones.

The first app is an entertainment app and social networking. The aim is to seamlessly combine social networking and entertainment together in one fluid experience where a user always has something to do.
The next product that is being launched is a mobile bookkeeping application for small and medium enterprises.

peter is dedicated to creating mobile and web solutions to solve problems and challenges facing people. He love his job and enjoys coding very much. In one short sentence he love creating great apps that are useful to people.
